title: Guided Meditation for Deep Relaxation | Gurudev
description:
Meditations By Gurudev is the Art Of Living's official YouTube channel for all meditations by Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar. 

Gurudev has made meditation simple, easy and accessible to all! He has improved the emotional, mental and physical health of millions across the globe through his meditations

If you're looking for a stress free, anxiety free, worry free life, then this channel is for you! All you need to do is sit back, relax and follow Gurudev's instructions!

Are you interested to learn meditation? Let us know by sharing your details on the link below, we will get back to you with details : https://aoliv.in/interested-meditation

About #Gurudev - 
World-renowned humanitarian, spiritual leader, and an ambassador of peace and human values. Through his life and work, Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar has inspired millions around the world with a vision of a stress-free and violence-free world. Gurudev founded The Art of Living, a non-profit organization that is engaged in stress-management and service initiatives across the world.

Learn Sudarshan Kriya the world's most powerful breathing technique: https://aoliv.in/learnsudarshankriya

Do Like, Comment, Share & Subscribe to the channel!

Subscribe to Gurudev's Channel: 
https://youtube.com/srisri

To stay connected with Gurudev's wisdom, meditations, books, music and more, download The Art of Living App: https://aoliv.in/aolapp 

🎧Listen to Gurudev on Spotify:
Talks - https://open.spotify.com/show/75Wx1Zy...
Meditations - https://open.spotify.com/show/6INVWvh...

comments: Build a habit of daily meditation practice with ease! Meditate Daily With Gurudev. Subscribe Now: http://tiny.cc/dailymeditate

Whenever I do meditation, I only able to listen to almost half of it, next half I will be sleeping... Till date couldn't complete any. I am really thankful for the meditation sessions. I came out of anxiety in a month without any medication...  😊

Met an amazing soul online, Dr Ashwin. He introduced me to this meditation 3 weeks ago. We started doing this together even if I complain that I don't like doing, he still manages to get it done by me. Today 7 Aug 2023, he is busy somewhere, we couldn't have our session, however how could I allow myself to disrespect this man and not follow what he showed me? So I did it alone. Thanks for everything, Ashwin! 🙏
If the days won’t allow us to see each other, memories will, and if my eyes can’t see you, my heart will never forget you...Stay Blessed always to the best male figure a female could ever have in her life.
❤️🧿🌸✨️
the state of relaxation releases the stiffness in the body...the headache goes away...thank you Guruji...you are God...🙏🌿💚🌿🌐
Somehow my eyes welled up with tears but my face was lit up with smile.Tears trickled down but heart was calm and peaceful.
